com.munger.passwordkeeper.view.widget

Class TextInputWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • android.widget.ViewAnimator
            • android.widget.ViewSwitcher
              • com.munger.passwordkeeper.view.widget.TextInputWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class TextInputWidget
extends android.widget.ViewSwitcher
    General purpose text input widget composed of a label or text input and a delete button. There are two views here that can be switch by setting it as editable or not.
    Author:
    codymunger

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextInputWidget

        public TextInputWidget(android.content.Context context)

      • TextInputWidget

        public TextInputWidget(android.content.Context context,
               android.util.AttributeSet attrs)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        context - the application context
        attrs - There are three accepted extra attributes for this widget: align, noDelete, and hint
        align can be left, center, or right
        noDelete can be true or false and hides the delete button
        hint provides a hint for the input text box
